task.title: Hide Nodes in Commands Tab
task.shortdesc: Temporarily remove nodes from the dataset using the following steps.

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

step.cmd: Select desired nodes, either manually or by clicking a Set or Class type.

taskbody.result: As a result, the Selected nodes will removed from the visualization and will no longer appear in the central Graph, Shelf or Discard Bin.
